What value did you pass for args.num_gpus? I got this error when passing 1. Then I understood that 'Mirrored' naturally means that there are at least 2 devices involved.

When you want to use only one device with DistributionStrategy, I think you have to use OneDeviceStrategy instead of MirroredStrategy.

body:
What value did you pass for `args.num_gpus`? I got this error when passing `1`. Then I understood that 'Mirrored' naturally means that there are at least 2 devices involved.

When you want to use only one device with DistributionStrategy, I think you have to use `OneDeviceStrategy` instead of `MirroredStrategy`.
